Name: Simple Resonium Box
Desc: Get <color=#2BAD00>a random</color> B-Rank Resonium and have a 10% chance to get an additional B-Rank Resonium.
Desc2:
It's not a Resonium from a Bangboo merchant, but was picked up during exploration of a Hollow.
Wrapped up in a simple box, it's sold on as a recyclable.
